hanzi-su-wiki:
壌

Значения

Земля, почва

Мнемоника

Земля 土, обработать которую можно лишь сообща (сняв одежду 衣, вместе делить 八, т.е. перемешивать её слои и поливать всходы из колодца 井).

Варианты

壤

rǎng
Japanese variant of 壤
Японский вариант 壤
rtega_mnemonic:
壤壤RS
壌壌		soil, loam, earth, rich
  • type of ground 土 for building houses for people to put off their clothes 襄/㐮: loam or for growing food: rich earth
heisig_constituent: lot, soil, dirt, ground, grass skirt, top hat, eight, six, animal legs, celery, scarf
heisig_story: Ground . . . grass skirt. The lot of this key word refers to a portion of land.
koohiiStory1: My dream is to buy a small lot on a tropical island and spend the rest of my days relaxing in a grass skirt.
koohiiStory2: On the island of JOU, in order to be considered a lot, a ground must be big enough to grow sufficient grass for a grass skirt.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A dirt nurse is someone who nurses dirt. When nursed, dirt becomes soil.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Soil generally has more nutrients in it. It makes sense for dirt that's been nursed to become soil.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Soil is a thing Jourm (じょう) the huge farmhand works on improving. If he makes the soil better, the farm will yield more crops.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine Jourm working with soil (not dirt!). Improving it by mixing in various ingredients. The soil this year is particularly lush, for some reason...
Ru_Radicals: 亠 (крышка), ハ, 土 (земля), 衣 (одежда)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the ground (土) where you can wear six lots of clothes together (㐮) is your plot of land

Name meaning

rǎng
яп. вм. 壤
Radicals: 土, 㐮  (dirt, nurse)
Meaning Mnemonic
A dirt nurse is someone who nurses dirt. When nursed, dirt becomes soil.
Soil generally has more nutrients in it. It makes sense for dirt that's been nursed to become soil.
Reading Mnemonic
Soil is a thing Jourm (じょう) the huge farmhand works on improving. If he makes the soil better, the farm will yield more crops.
Imagine Jourm working with soil (not dirt!). Improving it by mixing in various ingredients. The soil this year is particularly lush, for some reason...
